title: The Character of God: Foundation of All Truth
titleSw: Tabia ya Mungu: Msingi wa Ukweli Wote
excerpt: Before we can understand sin, salvation, or eternal life, we must first understand who God is. His character is the foundation upon which all biblical truth rests.
excerptSw: Kabla ya kuelewa dhambi, wokovu, au uzima wa milele, lazima kwanza tuelewa Mungu ni nani. Tabia yake ndiyo msingi ambao ukweli wote wa Biblia unajengwa.

title: A Plan Of Salvation
excerpt: I saw the lovely Jesus and beheld an expression of sympathy and sorrow upon His countenance.
excerptSw: Nilimwona Yesu mwenye upendo na nikaona kielelezo cha huruma na huzuni katika uso Wake

title: The One Possible Way of Salvation
titleSw: Njia Moja Pekee Inayowezekana ya Wokovu
excerpt: Jesus said to them that He would by His death save many, that the life of an angel could not pay the debt..
excerptSw: Yesu akawaambia kuwa kwa kifo Chake angewaokoa wengi, kwamba maisha ya malaika yasingeweza kulipa deni hilo.

title: God’s Unchangeable Law
excerpt: The law of God could not be changed to meet man’s necessity, for in God’s arrangement it was never to lose its force nor give up the smallest part of its claims.
excerptSw: Sheria ya Mungu haikuweza kubadilishwa ili kukidhi uhitaji wa mwanadamu, kwani katika mpangilio wa Mungu haikupaswa kamwe kupoteza nguvu yake wala kuachia sehemu ndogo kabisa ya madai yake.

title: A View of the Future
excerpt: Adam was carried down through successive generations and saw the increase of crime, of guilt and defilement, because man would yield to his naturally strong inclinations to transgress the holy law of God.
excerptSw: Adamu alionyeshwa vizazi vilivyofuatana na kuona kuongezeka kwa uhalifu, hatia na uchafu, kwa sababu mwanadamu angejiachia kwenye mielekeo yake ya asili yenye nguvu ya kuasi sheria takatifu ya Mungu.

title: The Sacrificial Offering
excerpt: This ceremonial offering, ordained of God, was to be a perpetual reminder to Adam of his guilt, and also a penitential acknowledgment of his sin.
excerptSw: Sadaka hii ya kisherehe, iliyoamriwa na Mungu, ilipaswa kuwa kikumbusho cha kudumu kwa Adamu juu ya hatia yake, na pia ukiri wa toba wa dhambi yake.o.

title: First Angle's Message
excerpt: Revelation 14:7. He said in a loud voice, “Fear God and give him glory, because the hour of his judgment has come. Worship him who made the heavens, the earth, the sea and the springs of water.”
excerptSw: Ufunuo 14:7; Akasema kwa sauti kuu, 'Mcheni Mungu, na kumtukuza, kwa maana saa ya hukumu yake imekuja. Msujudieni yeye aliyezifanya mbingu na nchi na bahari na chemchemi za maji.

title: The Second Angel’s Message
excerpt: Revelation 14:8 A second angel followed and said, 'Fallen! Fallen is Babylon the Great, which made all the nations drink the maddening wine of her adulteries.
excerptSw: Ufunuo 14: 7, Malaika mwingine, wa pili, akafuata, akisema, 'Umeanguka, umeanguka Babeli, ule mji ulio mkuu, ambao uliwanywesha mataifa yote mvinyo wa ghadhabu ya uasherati wake

title: The Earthly and Heavenly Sanctuaries
titleSw: Patakatifu pa Duniani na pa Mbinguni

title: The Cleansing of the Sanctuary
excerpt: A work of investigative judgment and the blotting out of sins in the heavenly sanctuary, beginning at the close of the 2300 days in 1844..
excerptSw: Kazi ya hukumu ya upelelezi na kufutwa kwa dhambi katika patakatifu pa mbinguni, kuanzia mwishoni mwa siku 2300 mnamo mwaka 1844.

title: The Third Angel’s Message
excerpt: And the third angel followed them, saying with a loud voice, If any man worship the beast and his image, and receive his mark in his forehead, or in his hand,.. Revelation 14:9-12
excerptSw: Na malaika mwingine, wa tatu, akawafuata, akisema kwa sauti kuu, Mtu awaye yote akimsujudu huyo mnyama na sanamu yake, na kuipokea chapa katika kipaji cha uso wake, au katika mkono wake,

title: The Beast and Its Image
excerpt: The prophecy of Revelation 13 concerning religious and civil authorities that oppose the law of God.
excerptSw: Unabii wa Ufunuo 13 kuhusu mamlaka ya kidini na kiserikali inayopingana na sheria ya Mungu

title: A Solemn Message
excerpt: The last message of mercy given to the world before the visitation of God’s judgments
excerptSw: Onyo la mwisho la rehema lililotolewa kwa ulimwengu kabla ya hukumu.

title: The Cross: Where Justice and Mercy Meet
titleSw: Msalaba: Mahali Ambapo Haki na Rehema Zinakutana
excerpt: At the cross, we see the fullest revelation of God's character—His justice that cannot overlook sin, and His mercy that provides salvation.
excerptSw: Msalabani, tunaona ufunuo kamili wa tabia ya Mungu—haki yake isiyoweza kupuuza dhambi, na rehema yake inayotoa wokovu.

title: The New Earth
titleSw: Kutembea na Mungu: Uzima wa Milele Unaanza Sasa
excerpt: “And I saw a new heaven and a new earth: for the first heaven and the first earth were passed away.” Revelation 21:1
excerptSw: Kisha nikaona mbingu mpya na nchi mpya; kwa maana mbingu za kwanza na nchi ya kwanza zimekwisha kupita

title: The New Jerusalem
titleSw: Kutembea na Mungu: Uzima wa Milele Unaanza Sasa
excerpt: “I will rejoice in Jerusalem, and joy in My people.” Isaiah 65:19.
excerptSw: Nami nitaufurahia mji wa Yerusalemu, nitawafurahia watu wangu.Sauti ya kilio haitasikika tena,kilio cha taabu hakitakuwako.
